title: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming with this introductory course. Covers fundamental concepts such as variables, control structures, and functions.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Explore the foundations of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first web pages and understand how to structure and style them.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: Discover the essential concepts of data science, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Hands-on exercises and real-world examples included.

title: Graphic Design Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design, including typography, color theory, and layout design. Create your own designs using popular design tools.

title: Business Management
description: Gain a comprehensive understanding of business management principles, including strategic planning, marketing, finance, and human resources.
